results.title: Auth0 Bot - Code Samples
results.description: This sample demonstrates how to authenticate users in a Microsoft Teams bot using Auth0 login and retrieve their profile details.

results.title: Auth0 partner topics with Azure Event Grid - Azure Event Grid
results.description: Send events from Auth0 to Azure services with Azure Event Grid.

descriptions.content: The Auth0 partner topic allows you to use events that are emitted by Auth0's system to accomplish many tasks.
